author: Darrin Fong
name: tckedit Track editor
description: Perform various editing operations on track files.

inputs.description: Specify an inclusion region of interest, as either a binary mask image. Streamlines must traverse ALL inclusion regions to be accepted.
inputs.name: include binary mask region

inputs.description: Specify an inclusion region of interest, as a sphere using 4 comma-separared values (x,y,z,radius). Streamlines must traverse ALL inclusion regions to be accepted.
inputs.name: include sphere region

inputs.description: Specify an exclusion region of interest, as either a binary mask image. Streamlines that enter ANY exclude region will be discarded.
inputs.name: exclude binary mask region

inputs.description: Specify an exclusion region of interest, as a sphere using 4 comma-separared values (x,y,z,radius). Streamlines that enter ANY exclude region will be discarded.
inputs.name: exclude sphere region

inputs.description: Specify a masking region of interest, as either a binary mask image. If defined, streamlines exiting the mask will be truncated.
inputs.name: mask binary mask region

inputs.description: Specify a masking region of interest, as a sphere using 4 comma-separared values (x,y,z,radius). If defined, streamlines exiting the mask will be truncated.
inputs.name: mask sphere region

inputs.description: Set the maximum length of any streamline in mm
inputs.name: maxlength

inputs.description: Set the minimum length of any streamline in mm
inputs.name: minlength

inputs.description: Set the desired number of selected streamlines to be propagated to the output file
inputs.name: number

inputs.description: Omit this number of selected streamlines before commencing writing to the output file
inputs.name: skip

inputs.description: Set the maximum weight of any streamline
inputs.name: maxweight

inputs.description: Set the minimum weight of any streamline
inputs.name: minweight

inputs.description: Output the inverse selection of streamlines based on the criteria provided, i.e. only those streamlines that fail at least one criterion will be written to file.
inputs.name: inverse

inputs.description: Only test the ends of each streamline against the provided include/exclude ROIs
inputs.name: Ends only

inputs.description: Specify a text scalar file containing the streamline weights
inputs.name: tck_weights_in

inputs.description: Specify the path for an output text scalar file containing streamline weights
inputs.name: tck_weights_out

inputs.description: Display information messages.
inputs.name: info

inputs.description: Do not display information messages or progress status.
inputs.name: quiet

inputs.description: Display debugging messages.
inputs.name: debug

inputs.description: Force overwrite of output files. Caution: Using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour.
inputs.name: force

inputs.description: Use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading)
inputs.name: nthreads

inputs.description: Display this information page and exit
inputs.name: help

inputs.description: Display version information and exit
inputs.name: version

inputs.description: The input track file(s)
inputs.name: tracks_in

inputs.description: The output track file
inputs.name: tracks_out

output-files.name: Streamline weights output
output-files.description: Text scalar file containing streamline weights
